Module kivakit.interfaces

Package com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric

package com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Arithmetic<Value>
     
    Castable
    Performs type-casting on a long value returned by Castable.asLong()
    CastTrait
    Utility methods to cast numbers
    DoubleQuantizable
    A quantizable object that can be turned into a double value.
    IntegerNumeric<Value>
    Interface for common operations on integers (in the math sense, not in the sense of Integer).
    Maximizable<Value>
    Determines which of two objects is the maximum.
    Minimizable<Value>
    Determines which of two objects is the minimum.
    Quantizable
    A quantizable object can be turned into a quantum.
    RandomNumeric
    Provides convenient random number methods given an implementation of RandomNumeric.randomLongExclusive(long, long), and RandomNumeric.randomDoubleZeroToOne().
